ygData.subject: Re: Testing loyalty
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois reached out and touched Child s spark. Instantly images of peace, happiness and The Matrix came into his mind. The powers of one blessed touching

Vulois reached out and touched Child's spark. Instantly images of 
peace, happiness and The Matrix came into his mind. The powers of one 
blessed touching another was an incredible surge of energy. Tears 
started streaming off Vulois' face. He pushed the Spark ack into 
Child's body. He than wiped the tears off his face and looked at 
Child.

"You have proven yourself. You are truly what you say you are. I 
never really doubted what you had in mind for your powers. It's your 
father that I am most worried about. I don't know if he truly wants 
peace. He might be using you. I shouldn't make accusations like this, 
but you need to be warned Child. Herald could very well be the man of 
peace he says he is, or he could be something more sinister. I rushed 
fooly ahead into an alliance without knowing who I was dealing with. 
You have been given into my custody Child for training, and until I 
know the truth about your father, I must keep you from him. If you 
are to be trained, than he must not have you. If he is what I'm 
sensing, than he could use you to your own advantage. Now you can 
have a choice. You may leave the embassy now and return to your 
father, or stay with me and learn all you can do, but may not see him 
again until I know the truth about him."

He than turned to Windrazor.

"Windrazor, I believe that you believed in honour, and than you loved 
Soundwave. But peace and honour are two different things. When we go 
th the alliance base, than you will prove youself. We will see if you 
can keep your anger in check. Now Child, I need a decision."
